title: The Lumber-Room
description: Young Nicholas escapes the watchful eye of his aunt and discovers the hidden wonders of the lumber-room--a place where adults store odds and ends that, to a boy, seem like wondrous treasures.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of visualization before and during reading
comprehension: Suffixes : Identify and use the suffix -ly
awareness:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
